price: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and with Allah is a great reward.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
